question.title: Swap the objects-Double pointers
question.content:
Refer Classes and objects track before doing this problem.
Here we will see how to use classes and objects and we'll swap the values of two objects. You have name, number, and height for two objects.

Examples : 

Input: obj1-> Morty 1234 6, obj2-> Rick 5678 5
Output: Rick 5678 5 
\t  Morty 1234 6

hints: 1. Use basic concept of swapping with class object.
